pages.text: The crucible is the first and likely most important tool of the $(thing)Hermeticist$(). It allows to dissolve objects into their $(thing)Essentia$(), and then use the $(thing)Essentia$() to create other objects.

pages.title: Heating
pages.text: In order to use the crucible, it needs to be filled with water using buckets. The water needs to be brought to a boil, to achieve this. place the crucible on a heate source, such as fire, lava, magma or a lit campfire.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use the crucible to $(italics)create$() items, one first needs to $(italics)dissolve$() matter to release it's $(thing)Essentia$(). To dissolve an item, simply drop it into the boiling water in the crucible. In order to use the crucible to create new items, $(bold)stir$() the boiling $(thing)Essentia$() by right-clicking it with $(l:getting_started/20_crucible#stirring_tools)the right stirring tool$(), then drop in the ingredient while $(bold)colorful bubbles$() show. The crafting time can be extended by stirring multiple times.

pages.title: Stirring Tools
pages.text: The stirring tool determines the type of crafting: $(li)$(thing)Stick$(): Purification$() $(li)$(thing)Pure Crystal Stirrer$(): Replication$()$() $(li)$(thing)Prima Materia Crystal Stirrer$(): Transmutation$()$()
